synthesis_conditions.additional_information: L grafted onto both sides of the Anderson POM

crystallography.building_unit: tetrahedral Cu4I4 clusters linked by [MnMo6O18L2]3¢ cluster bridges

framework_properties.topology: 4-connected porous anionic framework with diamondoid topology
framework_properties.channel_sizes: 1.01 x 1.01 nm2 along the c axis

synthesis_conditions.additional_information: 3-fold interpenetration of three symmetry-related cluster organic frameworks

synthesis_conditions.additional_information: stacking of 2D layers gives rise to 1D channels
